description: Prints average timeseries (intensities) to the screen (or saves to a file).

coordinates.title: Coordinates
coordinates.description: Requested spatial coordinate (instead of mask). Must have exactly three numerical entries in the list (3-vector).

usemm_flag.title: Use mm flag
usemm_flag.description: Use mm instead of voxel coordinates (for -c option)

showall_flag.title: Showall flag
showall_flag.description: Show all voxel time series (within mask) instead of averaging

eigenv_flag.title: Eigenvariate(s) flag
eigenv_flag.description: Calculate Eigenvariate(s) instead of mean (output will have 0 mean)

no_bin_flag.title: No binarisation flag
no_bin_flag.description: Do not binarise the mask for calculation of Eigenvariates

label_image.title: Label Image
label_image.description: Input 3D label image (generate separate mean for each integer label value - cannot be used with showall)

transpose_flag.title: Transpose flag
transpose_flag.description: Output results in transpose format (one row per voxel/mean)

weighted_mean_flag.title: Weighted mean flag
weighted_mean_flag.description: Output weighted mean, using mask values as weights, and exit.
